languages.text: "Каким был этот мир до того, как облекся огненным покровом? Уж не твои ли предки, элантах, излили его нутро каким-то необдуманным поступком?"
"How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"
languages.original_text: "Каким был этот мир до того, как облекся огненным покровом? Уж не твои ли предки, элантах, излили его нутро каким-то необдуманным поступком?"

traits.locale_text: "How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"
"How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"
"How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"
"How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"

languages.text: « À quoi ressemblait ce monde, avant d'être recouvert d'un linceul de flammes ? Seraient-ce vos ancêtres, elantach, qui ont précipité l'effondrement de son noyau par quelque manœuvre inconsidérée ? »
languages.original_text: "How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"

traits.locale_text: « À quoi ressemblait ce monde, avant d'être recouvert d'un linceul de flammes ? Seraient-ce vos ancêtres, elantach, qui ont précipité l'effondrement de son noyau par quelque manœuvre inconsidérée ? »

languages.text: “在盖上这块火红的裹尸布前，这个世界原本是什么样子的？外界人，莫非是你的祖先做事不慎，把它的核心挖出来了？”
languages.original_text: "How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"

traits.locale_text: “在盖上这块火红的裹尸布前，这个世界原本是什么样子的？外界人，莫非是你的祖先做事不慎，把它的核心挖出来了？”

languages.text: 「この燃えるような覆いに包まれる前、この世界はどうだったのか？エランタ、お前の先祖が、何か思慮の欠けた行為でこの核を生み出したのか？」
languages.original_text: "How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"

traits.locale_text: 「この燃えるような覆いに包まれる前、この世界はどうだったのか？エランタ、お前の先祖が、何か思慮の欠けた行為でこの核を生み出したのか？」

languages.text: "Wie sah diese Welt aus, bevor sich dieser feurige Schleier über sie gelegt hat? Waren es Eure Ahnen, Elantach, die ihren Kern unbedacht ausgehöhlt haben?"
languages.original_text: "How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie sah diese Welt aus, bevor sich dieser feurige Schleier über sie gelegt hat? Waren es Eure Ahnen, Elantach, die ihren Kern unbedacht ausgehöhlt haben?"

languages.text: «¿Qué aspecto tenía este mundo antes de quedar envuelto por esta mortaja ardiente? Dime, elantach, ¿fueron tus antepasados quienes desataron su núcleo en un arrebato de insensatez?».
languages.original_text: "How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué aspecto tenía este mundo antes de quedar envuelto por esta mortaja ardiente? Dime, elantach, ¿fueron tus antepasados quienes desataron su núcleo en un arrebato de insensatez?».

languages.text: "Bu dünya, bu ateşli örtüyle kaplanmadan önce nasıl görünüyordu acaba? Elantach, bu dünyayı düşüncesizce çekirdeğinden eden senin ataların mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "How did this world look before it was enveloped in this fiery shroud? Was it your ancestors, elantach, who disgorged its core in some ill-considered act?"
